record.title: RECESS UNTIL 2 P.M., SATURDAY, NOVEMBER 29, 2008
record.narrative:
RECESS UNTIL 2 P.M., SATURDAY, NOVEMBER 29, 2008 -- (Senate - November 26, 2008)

[Page: S10781]

speaking.paragraph: Under the previous order, the Senate stands in recess until Saturday, November 29, 2008, at 2 p.m.
Thereupon, the Senate, at 10 and 40 seconds a.m., recessed until Saturday, November 29, 2008, at 2 p.m.
